FOUND IN: Ardor (Old French "ardour", meaning intense heat or passion)

CLUE: Coin as opposed to paper money
FOUND IN: Specie (historical term for gold or silver coins)
Oracle - A person or thing regarded as an infalliaturprophecy of the future.
Howl at the moon - This is an actual behavior exhibited by wolves but also metaphorically implies someone who might seem out of touch or not grounded in reality.
Marimba - A large, mallet percussion instrument with wooden bars and resonators similar to the xylophone.
